sentences.sContent: The earplug is moved from ear to ear to indicate the current date.
sentences.sContent_eng: The earplug is moved from ear to ear to indicate the current date.
sentences.sCn: 移动耳塞用来指示相应的日期。

sentences.sContent: When go into workshop please ware the safety helmet , safety glasses and earplug , and ware the respirator if necessarily .
sentences.sContent_eng: When go into workshop please ware the safety helmet , safety glasses and earplug , and ware the respirator if necessarily .
sentences.sCn: 进入车间必须确保佩戴安全帽、防护眼镜、耳塞，必要时使用口罩。

sentences.sContent: Our dog almost died, I learned a new language, I made new friends, I solved new problems, and I got an earplug stuck in my ear. You know, the usual stuff when you travel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our dog almost died, I learned a new language, I made new friends, I solved new problems, and I got an earplug stuck in my ear. You know, the usual stuff when you travel.
sentences.sCn: 我们的狗都快死了，我学会了一种新的语言，认识了新的朋友，解决了各种新问题，塞上了耳塞——一些旅行时就会有的事。

trans.tranOther: a small piece of rubber that you put inside your ear to keep out noise or water
